pages.text: $(li)M - Open the map$(li)C - Zoom in (use scroll wheel to adjust zoom level)$(li)G - Open accessories menu (new slots to place items like gloves, belts, hats, etc.)$(li)B - Open backpack inventory, if the player has one
$(li)R - when hovering over any item or block, view its crafting recipe.$(li)U - when hovering over any item or block, see which crafting recipes it's used as an ingredient.
